tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RecyclingBins (
  bin_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  bin_capacity INT,
  bin_status VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES WasteManagementPractices(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WasteCollectionHistory (
  collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  collection_date DATE,
  collected_waste_type VARCHAR(50),
  quantity_collected FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES WasteManagementPractices(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_management_destinations (
  id SERIAL,
  destination_name VARCHAR(255),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  recycling_program BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_points (
  id SERIAL,
  point_name VARCHAR(100),
  location_description TEXT,
  city VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50),
  capacity INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE waste_categories (
  id SERIAL,
  category_name VARCHAR(100),
  recyclable BOOLEAN,
  landfill BOOLEAN,
  organic BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE waste_collection_logs (
  collection_id SERIAL,
  collection_date DATE,
  point_id INTEGER,
  category_id INTEGER,
  weight_kg DECIMAL(10,2)
);
